cocktails.name: Margarita
cocktails.ingredients: 2 oz Tequila, 1 oz Lime juice, 1 oz Triple sec
cocktails.instructions: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick to it. Take care to moisten only the outer rim and sprinkle the salt on it. The salt should present to the lips of the imbiber and never mix into the cocktail.

cocktails.name: Martini
cocktails.instructions: Place ice and water in a glass to chill it. Pour gin and vermouth into a mixing glass. Stir well for 20 seconds and strain into the chilled glass.

cocktails.name: Negroni
cocktails.ingredients: 1 oz Gin, 1 oz Campari, 1 oz Sweet Vermouth
cocktails.instructions: Stir all ingredients with ice, then strain into a glass.

cocktails.name: Bloody Mary
cocktails.ingredients: 1 1/2 oz Vodka, 3 oz Tomato juice, 1/2 oz Lemon juice, Dash of Worcestershire sauce, Dash of Tabasco sauce, Pinch of salt and pepper
cocktails.instructions: Build all ingredients in a glass over ice. Stir gently.
